height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;" parent="1" source="3" target="5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-428.63" y="175" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-429.09000000000003" y="243.5999999999999" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;"><b style="font-size: 14px;">MemoryStatsd Process</b></span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(Collects and Logs<br style="font-size: 14px;">Memory Data)</font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;align=center;gradientColor=#D9D9D9;strokeColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-240" y="240" width="180" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6" value="<b style="font-size: 14px;">Data Storage</b><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(Stores Memory Statistics Compressed Data in Persistent Memory)</font><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;gradientColor=#D9D9D9;strokeColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="240" width="180" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7" value="<b style="font-size: 14px;">Unix Socket</b><font style="font-size: 14px;"> <b style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Communication</font></b></font><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(Handles IPC for Data Transmission)</font></div>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="8" value="<b style="font-size: 14px;">CLI Tools</b><div style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(User Interface for Custom Memory Data Display parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-50" y="255" width="140" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="31" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 14px; float: none; display: inline !important;">Fetches Memory Data</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-50" y="286" width="140" height="25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="32" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; Memory Data</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-235" y="175" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="53o9Rew4gOh5kCrF5x-k-33" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="180" y="400" /> <mxPoint x="-105" y="400" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="53o9Rew4gOh5kCrF5x-k-35" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-360" y="624.5" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-240" y="625" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18pGnGixVlwVrJT5TiXl-32" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>Reads Defaults from Config File&nbsp;</b></font><div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>on Startup</b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="350.67" width="240" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18pGnGixVlwVrJT5TiXl-34" value="<div style="line-height: 15.6px;"><b style=""><font style="font-size: 14px;">HostConfigDaemon</font></b></div><div style="line-height: 15.6px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">(Listens to changes in ConfigDB, detects updates, and signals MemoryStatsd process<span style="background-color: initial;">)</span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;gradientColor=#D9D9D9;strokeColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-240" y="580" width="180" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="18pGnGixVlwVrJT5TiXl-35" value="<div><b>Config File&nbsp;</b></div><div>(Stores default configuration settings that the memstats process reads at restart)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;gradientColor=#D9D9D9;strokeColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontSize=14;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="580" width="180" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
